The baptism <WG908> of John, <WG2491> from where <WG4159> was it? from heaven, <WG3772> or <WG2228> of men? <WG444> And they reasoned <WG1260> with themselves, <WG1438> saying, <WG3004> If <WG1437> we shall say, <WG2036> From heaven; <WG3772> he will say <WG2046> to us, Why <WG1302> did you not then <WG3767> believe <WG4100> him?

He answered <WG611> and said, <WG2036> I will <WG2309> not: but afterward <WG5305> he repented, <WG3338> and went. <WG565>

Whether <WG5101> of them two <WG1417> did <WG4160> the will <WG2307> of his father? <WG3962> They say <WG3004> to him, The first. <WG4413> Jesus <WG2424> said <WG3004> to them, Truly <WG281> I say <WG3004> to you, That the publicans <WG5057> and the harlots <WG4204> go <WG4254> into <WG1519> the kingdom <WG932> of God <WG2316> before <WG4254> you.

Hear <WG191> another <WG243> parable: <WG3850> There was a certain <WG444> <WG5100> householder, <WG3617> which <WG3748> planted <WG5452> a vineyard, <WG290> and hedged <WG5418> <WG4060> it round about, <WG4060> and dig <WG3736> a wine press <WG3025> in it, and built <WG3618> a tower, <WG4444> and let <WG1554> it out to farmers, <WG1092> and went <WG589> into <WG1519> a far country: <WG589>

Again, <WG3825> he sent <WG649> other <WG243> servants <WG1401> more <WG4119> than the first: <WG4413> and they did <WG4160> to them likewise. <WG5615>

Jesus <WG2424> said <WG3004> to them, Did you never <WG3763> read <WG314> in the scriptures, <WG1124> The stone <WG3037> which <WG3739> the builders <WG3618> rejected, <WG593> the same <WG3778> is become <WG1096> <WG1519> the head <WG2776> of the corner: <WG1137> this <WG3778> is the Lord's <WG2962> doing, <WG1096> and it is marvelous <WG2298> in our eyes? <WG3788>
